meanings.definition: A person who operates a motorboat.
meanings.sent1: The motorboaters navigated the lake with ease.
meanings.sent2: We saw the motorboaters enjoying the sunny day on the water.
meanings.sent3: The motorboaters raced each other to the other side of the lake.
meanings.sent4: The motorboaters were like skilled captains on their vessels.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the motorboaters echoed across the calm water.

meanings.definition: A group of people who engage in motorboating as a recreational activity.
meanings.sent1: Our family joined the motorboaters for a fun day on the river.
meanings.sent2: The motorboaters gathered at the marina for their weekend outing.
meanings.sent3: The motorboaters had a picnic by the shore after their ride.
meanings.sent4: The motorboaters formed a colorful parade on the water.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the motorboaters filled the air as they cruised along.
